result.execSummary:
The defendant Hector Y. Schmidt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Hector Y. Schmidt is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Hector Y. Schmidt was found guilty of Obtain Controlled Substance by Fraud, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.43(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent to 14CF221, but consecutive to 14CF399, 14CF499 & 14CF1302.  Credit for 21 days if revoked.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  
*  Pay supervision fees.  
Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not be in taverns or on any premises licensed for the sale of intoxicating beverages, except restaurants or grocery stores.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Submit voluntarily to random tests of blood, breath or urine.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.  
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  
*  Cash bond posted shall be applied.    
If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  
*  Submit to a DNA sample (unless previously provided) and pay surcharge.  
May not associate with gangs/gang members or gang affiliations.  May not have contact with Bionka J, unless otherwise permitted by the court only.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.  Maintain stable residence.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Valerie Karls.  Clerk: PT
Sentencing arguments made.  Count 1 - Sentence is withheld; Deft. placed on probation for 3 years with conditions Concurrent to 14CF221, but Consecutive to 14CF399, 14CF499 and 14CF1302.  Credit for 21 days if revoked.  No contact with Bionka J. unless permitted by the Court only.  Cash Bond on deposit in 14CF221, 14CF226, 14CF399 and 14CF499 shall be applied between all 5 files, which includes 14CF1302.  Appeal Rights, Firearm Warning and Voting Acknowledgement given.

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Valerie Karls.  Clerk: PT
Case is resolved.  Counts 1 - Deft. pleads Guilty; found guilty by the court.  Counts 2, 3 and 4 - Dismissed by the State.  PSI ordered for Sentencing on 3/18/15 at 11:00 AM.
Demand for Discovery filed by Atty Drees

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Valerie Karls.  Clerk: PT
Atty Karls states DE is not eligible for drug court and requests another adjournment to discuss an offer with the state.  Court grants one final adjournment.  FPT on 1/28/15 at 10:10 AM.
Due to courts unavailability; hearing rescheduled to 1/7/15 at 10:00 AM pending confirmation from Atty Karls.

Attorney Angelina Gabriele appeared for the State. Defendant, Hector Y. Schmidt, appeared with Attorney Valerie Stuart Karls.  Clerk: PT
Arguments were heard on defendant's bond motion in 14CF266 and motion to lift no contact order in that file were denied by the court.  Status Conf. on 12/5/14 at 11:00 AM.
Status conference on October 23, 2014 at 09:45 am.
Due to continued jury trial; Status Conf. rescheduled to 10/23/14 at 9:45 AM and confirmed with Atty Karls.

Defendant Hector Y. Schmidt appeared with Attorney Valerie S Karls.  Attorney Angelina Gabriele appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES:  14CF221, 14CF266, 14CF399,14CF499:  Victim rights compliance.  Defense Attorney requesting an adjournment, needs more time to file another motion.  Matter set over, bond continued.  Def. atty is not available the week of 8/18/14  Status conference scheduled for September 10, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Hector Y. Schmidt appeared with Attorney Hilary D Edwards.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Angelina Gabriele appeared for the Prosecution.  Court Reporter:  Cyndi Chike.  Clerk: J. Mattner.
MINUTES: 14CF221, 14CF266, 14CF399:  Victim rights compliance.  Per defense Atty, the def. is a good candidate for the Drug Court Program and def. needs more time to complete the Living Free Program.  Matter set over, bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for July 7, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Val Karls. Clerk LE.  Plea offer placed on the record by ADA Trigg.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 4. Information filed, plea of not guilty. Judicial pretrial on 5-1-14 @ 9:00am with 14CF221. Bond continued.
Preliminary Hearing Waiver/Plea Offer
to Preliminary Hearing

157 p.m.  Attorney Michael Graveley appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clk  LE.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Comm Mason on  3/18/14 @ 930 a.m.   $1000 Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).

*Not to possess or consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No Contact w/ Kenosha Memorial Hospital except for emergecy treatement.
961.43(1)(a) Obtaining a Controlled Substance by Fraud   /   946.41(1) Obstructing   /   946.49(1)(b) Felony BJ
